name: ScoopFare
description: Rails app comparing prices between Uber and Lyft services.
My primary responsibilities were translating image mockups to code. I worked with our designer to maintain consistency between our page views, and ensuring proper user navigation.

name: VisionZero Project
description: Web based mapping tool for the city of Toronto displaying Toronto Police Service’s data from the Open Data Portal for all traffic collisions where a person was either killed or seriously injured (KSI) from 2007‐2017 by mode of travel.

name: SimpList
description: Simple todo list app with basic CRUD operations. Built with React JS front-end and Rails back-end.

name: Solar
description: Weather Finder App that returns the forecast of queried area obtained from OpenWeatherMap API.
Units in metrics. Built with React JS.

name: PokeGIFs
description: Using pokemon and giphy APIs to make a simple PokeGIF API with a single endpoint /pokemon/:id

name: IMg
description: Simplified photo-hosting app as an introduction to MVC architecture. Built RESTful Routes on Rails.

name: Rainforest
description: Simplified e-commerce Rails app. Group project to learn about nested routing, database relationships, and authorization.

name: TicTacToe
description: Simple Game of TicTacToe coded in vanilla JS.
